main event: Five lights, ranging in color from off-white to light amber, were observed ascending gradually in a train formation at Anderson AFB, Guam.
interesting points: The lights were observed visually and detected on radar.
The lights were concluded to be balloons.
The report mentions that similar light tests were conducted by a unit in the past.
The report indicates that action was being taken to prevent future occurrences of such sightings.
result: The objects were identified as balloons.
sighted object: Five lights in a train formation
